bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description: It appears that after the migration to AWS, there are server configuration failure: (from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/765>#765</denchmark-link> ) <denchmark-code>... After everything is built and packaged ... dpkg-genchanges: including full source code in upload dpkg-source --after-build nnstreamer dpkg-buildpackage: full upload; Debian-native package (full source is included) I: Copying back the cached apt archive contents I: unmounting /var/www/html/nnstreamer/TAOS-CI/ci/repo-workers/pr-checker/201811051114580.87725400924683-765-80929daaa0a167dd519a59ba89407b96ccc707ff filesystem I: unmounting dev/pts filesystem I: unmounting run/shm filesystem I: unmounting proc filesystem I: cleaning the build env I: removing directory /var/cache/pbuilder/build/92654 and its subdirectories cp: cannot create regular file '/var/cache/pbuilder/result/nnstreamer_0.0.3-1rc1.dsc': Permission denied </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/770>#770</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

Updated the server setting manual.
nnstreamer/TAOS-CI#376
